body:
medicine h.s

a/n: I love harry so much and while listening to medicine I got like all these ideas and here we are. enjoy this series I suppose, I have no idea how long I wanna make it so you’ll guys have stick around and see how it goes. As always, <3 Isabel.

Warnings for what is to come in this series: M 4 Mature(wrap the Willy b4 u get silly), use of crude language, and mention of alcohol and drugs (plz for ur safety don’t mix these two together.)

Part One: The first show.

Rule number one : no kissing

You swiped the red lipstick across your lips, pressing them together and releasing them slowly. You wanted to go for sultry, sultry was good but you also wanted simple and classic. That’s why you settled on black winged eyeliner. A coat of mascara on your eyelashes too, a little bit on the bottom ones too.

“Well don’t you look sexy!”

Leaning on the door frame stood Mars. It wasn’t quite clear how you had become friends; let alone how you met. A small smirk playing on her lips. She was the embodiment of rebellious. She was the girl you would read about or see only in movies. She was your mentor.

“You like?”

You immediately began to twirl showing off your outfit ; a simple spaghetti strap a-line dress that ended mid-thigh. A nice pair of chunky heels that you got from the thrift down the road clad on your feet. Your hair straighten and tied up. Even though that took for fucking ever. And lastly your gold Virgin Mary necklace falling to your chest. Simple was good, simple was classy.

“Love!”

°°°

You couldn’t help the nerves in your stomach. Yes, you had done this plenty before but this time it was different. However you tried to push that thought away because it could not, under any circumstance be different.

He only had to notice you tonight and he would be hooked. He had to be.

“Can’t believe we convince Dani to get us these seats, they’re absolutely fucking ridiculous.”

You nodded, still feeling your nerves on edge since the moment you saw how close to the stage you were. Dani could only ever manage to snatch side seats. But you were front and center.

“Awfully quiet babe, you okay?”

You nodded once again before mumbling out a,

“Just a bit nervous is all.”

Mars sympathized with you, but not entirely. You had no reason to be, you would be fine. You always were.

A few hours later and the lights dimmed. Spotlights turned on once again and the screaming filled your senses. You loved this thrill. You loved concerts, the rush, the adrenaline, and most of all the connection. Seeing the way a musician connects and immerses themselves with a crowd of thousands of people, was and always would be exhilarating; no matter how many shows you had been to.

Rule number five: no screaming, only in bed.

You contained your complete composure, letting a small smile fall on your lips. You had to be happy, but not too happy. Interested but not too interested or he wouldn’t spare a second glance.

“You’ll do good babe.”

Mars patted your back before immersing herself back to her character. She usually would try to go for a crew member but this was now, maybe if it was five months ago she would have. But it wasn’t and despite her being strong, she still was recovering.

The whole show you danced along to the music. Talking a bit to Mars every now and then. Trying so hard not to look at him too much. It was only four songs in and you had caught him looking 3 times. He stayed to the front of you which was absolutely a good sign.

It was when he was singing Only Angel that you knew you had him wrapped around your finger. He stooped down to your level watching, now more like admiring the way your body moved fluidly.

“She’s an angel, my only angel.”

His right eye fell into a wink and a small smirk played at his lips you immediately pulled away from him and began singing along to the song. The screaming only got louder as the girls beside you tried to figure out to who he sent that wink to.

“Cut it out.”

Mars glared at you and you nodded immediately returning to dancing instead. Forgeting that singing was not good. Interested but not too interested.

After more subtle flirting and gazes the show had finally ended. He wish everyone a good night and walked off with the rest of the band.

“Only 30 minutes. Remember you only wait thirty minutes, I’ll be in the car. Text me when your in okay love? ”

You nodded, before taking your hair down and grabbing any fallen pieces and securing it back up. She was a bit worried for you, it had been the first time you guys had done this since then,

“Yes, mum. Now go! He’ll never send anyone if I am not alone!”

She rolled her eyes and smiled before pressing a kiss to your cheek.

“Stay safe and have fun okay love?”

You pressed a chaste kiss and pushed her towards the leaving crowd. Bidding Mars a goodbye.

15 minutes.

You stood there pretending to wait for someone. That’s what always did the trick. The waiting game of course. Your back from the stage, and your arms wrapped around yourself. It was a nice show, a part of you would feel disappointed if he never bothered to get you. But you couldn’t let it, again this wasn’t any different.

“S'Quite cold don’t know why you wore that lovely.”

You let out a nervous breath letting a small smile fall to your lips before turning around. He looked so good, just like he always did. He stood on the stage, looking down at you. Changed in a pair of joggers and a white long sleeve. That’s when you noted he was that type, didn’t even bother sending a messenger. This is gonna be fun.

You held your small smile, rolling your eyes slightly and looking back up to him before sassing back, “I had a jacket, my friend took it though. She forgot hers in the car.”

“S’ that an American accent I hear?”

You nodded pressing your lips together. A silence fell for a second. His eyes dragged across your entire body, head to toe. No one was left surprisingly and it was just you and Harry.

“Ya enjoy the show lovely?”

A smirk settling on his pink lips. Dimple popping out of his right cheek. You couldn’t help the flutter in your heart at the sight. He truly had this aura and that was rare with most musicians. No he was just like everyone else

“Why, think it was the best show I’ve been to in a while I’d say.”

You leaned back on the stage as he now sat, feet not even reaching the floor. Hands behind him, propping him up. Taking notice of the many rings clad on his fingers and how they all looked so beautiful themselves.

“Why’s that peach?”

You turned towards him completely. Tongue swiping over your bottom lip before speaking,

“M’ talking to you, aren’t I?”

A raspy chuckle fell from his lips, and you couldn’t help but let your smile grow a little wider.

“So, what’s ya name lovely?”

Both of your arms went to his sides. Setting yourself in front of him. Admiring his green eyes and the intoxicating scent that lingered of his body; you could definitely get used to that.

“Name is Y/n.”

He reached out pushing back a piece of hair that somehow had managed to fallen. A smile still on his lips. After a while he continued his questioning,

“How old are ya bub?”

You were 19. But for some reason 19 always scared any musician over 21. So you had to cute when answering this or he would never spare a second thought about you,

“Old enough for you, promise.”

°°°

He pushed you against the door as soon as it slammed shut. Only four blocks away, and no one in the crew said anything about your appearance which was truly a surprise to you. It was a nice hotel, you’ve been here once before and prices weren’t all too bad;Then again you always stayed in the decent rooms.

He leaned down to which you stopped him. Pushing his body away from yours. Nerves still settled deep in your tummy, or was it butterflies? Fuck, it was butterflies. Again, he was not any different. Even if he was Harry fucking Styles, the man you had loved since you were a fucking preteen. He was just another musician. Just another fuck.

“What’s the matter love?”

You sat on the bed patting a space next to him. He followed almost immediately and set his arm behind you.

“Just got a rule,”

“S'fine love, go on.”

You reached up playing with the tips of his hair, it was growing back and you couldn’t tell what you wanted more. His long hair or his now short hair resembling a somewhat better version of his 2013 hair.

“No kissing.”

His eyes widened a bit, and he let out a laugh thinking you weren’t serious. They never did. After a silence fell he cleared his throat before prying,

“You’re serious.”

You hummed, nodding. It always threw them off. But that rule was there for a reason. It was too intimate, too personal. Too invested for being just a groupie.

“S’ that all lovely?”

“Yea, it is.” And with one more look you got up and went on your knees in from of him. Hands setting on his thighs, his eyes not leaving you and you brought them up to the drawstrings that were tied together.

“Now, can I suck your cock?”

You nodded, still feeling your nerves on edge since the moment you saw how close to the stage you were. Dani could only ever manage to snatch side seats. But you were front and center.

“Awfully quiet babe, you okay?”

You nodded once again before mumbling out a,

“Just a bit nervous is all.”

Mars sympathized with you, but not entirely. You had no reason to be, you would be fine. You always were.

A few hours later and the lights dimmed. Spotlights turned on once again and the screaming filled your senses. You loved this thrill. You loved concerts, the rush, the adrenaline, and most of all the connection. Seeing the way a musician connects and immerses themselves with a crowd of thousands of people, was and always would be exhilarating; no matter how many shows you had been to.

Rule number five: no screaming, only in bed.

You contained your complete composure, letting a small smile fall on your lips. You had to be happy, but not too happy. Interested but not too interested or he wouldn’t spare a second glance.

“You’ll do good babe.”

Mars patted your back before immersing herself back to her character. She usually would try to go for a crew member but this was now, maybe if it was five months ago she would have. But it wasn’t and despite her being strong, she still was recovering.

The whole show you danced along to the music. Talking a bit to Mars every now and then. Trying so hard not to look at him too much. It was only four songs in and you had caught him looking 3 times. He stayed to the front of you which was absolutely a good sign.

It was when he was singing Only Angel that you knew you had him wrapped around your finger. He stooped down to your level watching, now more like admiring the way your body moved fluidly.

“She’s an angel, my only angel.”

His right eye fell into a wink and a small smirk played at his lips you immediately pulled away from him and began singing along to the song. The screaming only got louder as the girls beside you tried to figure out to who he sent that wink to.

“Cut it out.”

Mars glared at you and you nodded immediately returning to dancing instead. Forgeting that singing was not good. Interested but not too interested.

After more subtle flirting and gazes the show had finally ended. He wish everyone a good night and walked off with the rest of the band.

“Only 30 minutes. Remember you only wait thirty minutes, I’ll be in the car. Text me when your in okay love? ”

You nodded, before taking your hair down and grabbing any fallen pieces and securing it back up. She was a bit worried for you, it had been the first time you guys had done this since then,

“Yes, mum. Now go! He’ll never send anyone if I am not alone!”

She rolled her eyes and smiled before pressing a kiss to your cheek.

“Stay safe and have fun okay love?”

You pressed a chaste kiss and pushed her towards the leaving crowd. Bidding Mars a goodbye.

15 minutes.

You stood there pretending to wait for someone. That’s what always did the trick. The waiting game of course. Your back from the stage, and your arms wrapped around yourself. It was a nice show, a part of you would feel disappointed if he never bothered to get you. But you couldn’t let it, again this wasn’t any different.

“S'Quite cold don’t know why you wore that lovely.”

You let out a nervous breath letting a small smile fall to your lips before turning around. He looked so good, just like he always did. He stood on the stage, looking down at you. Changed in a pair of joggers and a white long sleeve. That’s when you noted he was that type, didn’t even bother sending a messenger. This is gonna be fun.

You held your small smile, rolling your eyes slightly and looking back up to him before sassing back, “I had a jacket, my friend took it though. She forgot hers in the car.”

“S’ that an American accent I hear?”

You nodded pressing your lips together. A silence fell for a second. His eyes dragged across your entire body, head to toe. No one was left surprisingly and it was just you and Harry.

“Ya enjoy the show lovely?”

A smirk settling on his pink lips. Dimple popping out of his right cheek. You couldn’t help the flutter in your heart at the sight. He truly had this aura and that was rare with most musicians. No he was just like everyone else

“Why, think it was the best show I’ve been to in a while I’d say.”

You leaned back on the stage as he now sat, feet not even reaching the floor. Hands behind him, propping him up. Taking notice of the many rings clad on his fingers and how they all looked so beautiful themselves.

“Why’s that peach?”

You turned towards him completely. Tongue swiping over your bottom lip before speaking,

“M’ talking to you, aren’t I?”

A raspy chuckle fell from his lips, and you couldn’t help but let your smile grow a little wider.

“So, what’s ya name lovely?”

Both of your arms went to his sides. Setting yourself in front of him. Admiring his green eyes and the intoxicating scent that lingered of his body; you could definitely get used to that.

“Name is Y/n.”

He reached out pushing back a piece of hair that somehow had managed to fallen. A smile still on his lips. After a while he continued his questioning,

“How old are ya bub?”

You were 19. But for some reason 19 always scared any musician over 21. So you had to cute when answering this or he would never spare a second thought about you,

“Old enough for you, promise.”

°°°

He pushed you against the door as soon as it slammed shut. Only four blocks away, and no one in the crew said anything about your appearance which was truly a surprise to you. It was a nice hotel, you’ve been here once before and prices weren’t all too bad;Then again you always stayed in the decent rooms.

He leaned down to which you stopped him. Pushing his body away from yours. Nerves still settled deep in your tummy, or was it butterflies? Fuck, it was butterflies. Again, he was not any different. Even if he was Harry fucking Styles, the man you had loved since you were a fucking preteen. He was just another musician. Just another fuck.

“What’s the matter love?”

You sat on the bed patting a space next to him. He followed almost immediately and set his arm behind you.

“Just got a rule,”

“S'fine love, go on.”

You reached up playing with the tips of his hair, it was growing back and you couldn’t tell what you wanted more. His long hair or his now short hair resembling a somewhat better version of his 2013 hair.

“No kissing.”

His eyes widened a bit, and he let out a laugh thinking you weren’t serious. They never did. After a silence fell he cleared his throat before prying,

“You’re serious.”

You hummed, nodding. It always threw them off. But that rule was there for a reason. It was too intimate, too personal. Too invested for being just a groupie.

“S’ that all lovely?”

“Yea, it is.” And with one more look you got up and went on your knees in from of him. Hands setting on his thighs, his eyes not leaving you and you brought them up to the drawstrings that were tied together.

“Now, can I suck your cock?”

summary: Y/N catches Harry painting his nails and he tells her he’s bi too
body:
Y/N catches Harry painting his nails and he tells her he’s bi too

Harry had his tongue sticking out a bit as he focused on painting his nails black, biting his lip when a bit got onto his skin. His left hand was one nicely, well, decently. Harry was so master.

Painting his right hand is what always got him, because he wasn’t a lefty. Therefore, it always ended up being a mess.

He only gets to enjoy having his nails done for a few hours though, he always takes it off before Y/N gets home.

Deep down, he knows she would still love him, but he’s still afraid. Afraid she will judge him. Afraid she will not want to be with him anymore—or even worse, she will think Harry feels differently about her. And he doesn’t. Harry painting his nails and being bi (which he hasn’t told her about either) isn’t a game changer. Harry loved the relationship he has with Y/N and nothing changes. He just feels sexy with his nails painted, is that so bad? And he doesn’t mind getting on his knees for a man, is that so bad?

Of course not while he’s with Y/N. She’s his baby.

Therefore, when Y/N walked into their shared bedroom and Harry was using her black nail polish on his nails—she stood there for a moment, speechless.

“Y/N!-“ Harry almost choked. “Y/N, this isn’t-it’s not what it looks like-it’s-“

“Really?” She asked. “Because what it looks like is you’re making a mess. You have to have a steady hand. And don’t use so much, you have short nails, that way it won’t drip off onto your skin,” she said, putting her purse down and sitting beside Harry on their bed. “Here, let me see?”

Harry was….shocked?

“Really?” He asked.

She nodded and laughed softly at his messy nails. “Oh, baby. I’m gonna have to fix all of these, aren’t I?”

So she got up and went to the bathroom, retrieving the nail polish remover and a few cotton balls. Harry sat there, his hand in hers as she removed all of the nail polish from his finger tips and even the bit that dropped onto his knuckles….remember, he’s not a master.

“You get a little,” she spoke, dipping the brush into the glass bottle of nail polish and wiping it on the edge before sliding it across Harry’s short nails. “And do a layer at a time….” she smiled when she finished one hand. “See?”

She dipped the brush back into the bottle. “Give me the other.”

“Then when you finish both, the first one will be dry so you can go back and do the second layer—which just helps so it doesn’t chip.”

“Oh, I usually just take it off,” Harry mumbled timidly.

“Excuse me?! I’m doing an amazing job. You better leave this on for at least a week,” she said, focused on his nails and he smiled.

When she was done she spread her fingers and moved her hands back and forth, in drying motions. “Do this to help them dry.”

So he did, feeling absolutely beautiful and sexy and—he wanted to fuck her.

“Love, you didn’t have to do that…I’m sorry you saw that.”

“Sorry for what, bubs?” She asked, kissing his cheek softly. “So long as nothing between me and you changes I’m okay with you painting your nails. I think it’s cute,” she smiled sweetly.

“You do?”

She nodded. “Just as long as you come to me until you practice more because what you had going on was-“

“Shut up!” Harry giggled loudly.

Then Y/N gasped with an idea. “Harry, I have an idea.”

“What?” He asked as she got off of the bed and came back with a lilac nail polish.

“Practice on me!”

“P-are you sure?”

“Yeah! It’ll be so much fun!”

Harry couldn’t deny the smile twitching at his lips. “Well…okay, if that’s what you want.”

“Remember what I taught you,” she said as he sipped the brush into the glass bottle—then did what she taught him so that the brush wasn’t dripping with paint. Then he delicately brushed over her nail, smiling when it came out perfect. “Good,” Y/N smiled as Harry continued.

He made few mistakes, and when he did Y/N taught him how to deal with them. Like gently using a dry or unpainted nail go clean off the sides of your nail when the paint drips off to the side, or wiping the brush clean when too much paint is already on the nail—Harry learned a lot.

Y/N’s nails were nearly dry when Harry spoke. “Well, I guess now is as good a time to tell you as any….”

“Tell me asked?” She asked, her head tilting to the side.

“I’m…” he took a deep breath. “I’m bi.”

She was silent for a moment befor she smiled. “You are?”

Harry nodded.

“I-wait. You aren’t breaking up with me, are you?”

“No. No, I would never, baby. You’re my princess. You know I love you.”

“Oh, okay, good,” she smiled. “Well, in that case, come give your princess some sugar!” She held her arms open for a hug. She hummed as she held him tight. “I love you so much, baby,” she didn’t realize just how much those words meant to Harry—her having said them just after he came out to her—he had tears in his eyes now. “And I’m so so proud of you for coming out and being comfortable with yourself and confidence—and I’m so happy and grateful that you felt comfortable enough with me to tell me. Congratulations,” she kissed his cheek. “How does to feel to be out?” She smiled after they pulled away.

She frowned when she saw that he was crying, “….baby?”

His painted black finger nails wiped at his tears as he sniffled.

“Hey, what’s wrong?” She pouted, taking his hand in hers and using her free hand to wipe his cheeks. “What’s that, huh?” She cooed.

“I just,” he shook his head and the sight of him crying broke Y/N’s heart. “Thank you. You don’t know how afraid I was for you to know that—to even know that I paint my nails. I never planned on telling you any of this and you just,” he shook his head and wiped his eyes once more to stop the tears from sliding down his cheeks. “You’re so accepting and loving and sweet and….I couldn’t have asked for a better girlfriend and I’m so grateful to have you, baby. You’re my everything. I love you so so much. Thank you for loving me. Thank you for everything.”

Now Y/N was crying. “Baby, you don’t have to thank me. I love you. No matter what, okay?” They hugged again, tightly—neither of them wanted to let go.

“Promise me you won’t think any different of me? I don’t want this to change us,” Harry whispered.

“Of course it’s going to change us. I know you like to pain your nails. Do you understand how fun this is gonna be?!”

Harry rolled his teary eyes with a laugh as he sniffled. What’s he gotten himself into? He let go of her and smiled. “Baby love, I’m serious,” he whined slightly. “You still love me? Still gonna call me daddy like the good girl you are?”

“I’m never gonna stop calling you, daddy,” she hummed. “And this black nail polish only makes it roll off my tongue easier. You’re fingers look much more desrieable to suck on,” she said, making him laugh.

“Wanna suck on them now, lovey?”

“Absolutely not, gross. They’ll taste like nail polish and remover! Go wash your hands and lets wait until tomorrow.”

So Harry went and washed his hands with a smile that turned into a grin once he was alone in the bathroom. Harry’s first time ever coming out couldn’t of gone any better. This is the best day of his life.

____

“Oh, I usually just take it off,” Harry mumbled timidly.

“Excuse me?! I’m doing an amazing job. You better leave this on for at least a week,” she said, focused on his nails and he smiled.

When she was done she spread her fingers and moved her hands back and forth, in drying motions. “Do this to help them dry.”

So he did, feeling absolutely beautiful and sexy and—he wanted to fuck her.

“Love, you didn’t have to do that…I’m sorry you saw that.”

“Sorry for what, bubs?” She asked, kissing his cheek softly. “So long as nothing between me and you changes I’m okay with you painting your nails. I think it’s cute,” she smiled sweetly.

“You do?”

She nodded. “Just as long as you come to me until you practice more because what you had going on was-“

“Shut up!” Harry giggled loudly.

Then Y/N gasped with an idea. “Harry, I have an idea.”

“What?” He asked as she got off of the bed and came back with a lilac nail polish.

“Practice on me!”

“P-are you sure?”

“Yeah! It’ll be so much fun!”

Harry couldn’t deny the smile twitching at his lips. “Well…okay, if that’s what you want.”

“Remember what I taught you,” she said as he sipped the brush into the glass bottle—then did what she taught him so that the brush wasn’t dripping with paint. Then he delicately brushed over her nail, smiling when it came out perfect. “Good,” Y/N smiled as Harry continued.

He made few mistakes, and when he did Y/N taught him how to deal with them. Like gently using a dry or unpainted nail go clean off the sides of your nail when the paint drips off to the side, or wiping the brush clean when too much paint is already on the nail—Harry learned a lot.

Y/N’s nails were nearly dry when Harry spoke. “Well, I guess now is as good a time to tell you as any….”

“Tell me asked?” She asked, her head tilting to the side.

“I’m…” he took a deep breath. “I’m bi.”

She was silent for a moment befor she smiled. “You are?”

Harry nodded.

“I-wait. You aren’t breaking up with me, are you?”

“No. No, I would never, baby. You’re my princess. You know I love you.”

“Oh, okay, good,” she smiled. “Well, in that case, come give your princess some sugar!” She held her arms open for a hug. She hummed as she held him tight. “I love you so much, baby,” she didn’t realize just how much those words meant to Harry—her having said them just after he came out to her—he had tears in his eyes now. “And I’m so so proud of you for coming out and being comfortable with yourself and confidence—and I’m so happy and grateful that you felt comfortable enough with me to tell me. Congratulations,” she kissed his cheek. “How does to feel to be out?” She smiled after they pulled away.

She frowned when she saw that he was crying, “….baby?”

His painted black finger nails wiped at his tears as he sniffled.

“Hey, what’s wrong?” She pouted, taking his hand in hers and using her free hand to wipe his cheeks. “What’s that, huh?” She cooed.

“I just,” he shook his head and the sight of him crying broke Y/N’s heart. “Thank you. You don’t know how afraid I was for you to know that—to even know that I paint my nails. I never planned on telling you any of this and you just,” he shook his head and wiped his eyes once more to stop the tears from sliding down his cheeks. “You’re so accepting and loving and sweet and….I couldn’t have asked for a better girlfriend and I’m so grateful to have you, baby. You’re my everything. I love you so so much. Thank you for loving me. Thank you for everything.”

Now Y/N was crying. “Baby, you don’t have to thank me. I love you. No matter what, okay?” They hugged again, tightly—neither of them wanted to let go.

“Promise me you won’t think any different of me? I don’t want this to change us,” Harry whispered.

“Of course it’s going to change us. I know you like to pain your nails. Do you understand how fun this is gonna be?!”

Harry rolled his teary eyes with a laugh as he sniffled. What’s he gotten himself into? He let go of her and smiled. “Baby love, I’m serious,” he whined slightly. “You still love me? Still gonna call me daddy like the good girl you are?”

“I’m never gonna stop calling you, daddy,” she hummed. “And this black nail polish only makes it roll off my tongue easier. You’re fingers look much more desrieable to suck on,” she said, making him laugh.

“Wanna suck on them now, lovey?”

“Absolutely not, gross. They’ll taste like nail polish and remover! Go wash your hands and lets wait until tomorrow.”

So Harry went and washed his hands with a smile that turned into a grin once he was alone in the bathroom. Harry’s first time ever coming out couldn’t of gone any better. This is the best day of his life.

____
